11213221.content:
You wake up but to your surprise you are not in your room. In fact you are in a cage! But how? You jump up and look out the cage It was a large bedroom, quite fancy and expensive. That however didn't really matter at the moment. Then it it you. Holy crap you've shrunk! Again, how? You got really frightened as you wondered about this. What would happen to you now that you're small? And who on earth did this? Whoever it was they were clearly loaded, so that may or may not be a plus. At the very least please be a female. Then you heard a voice coming from the door. "I hope he's finally awake," a female voice said, and a very familiar one. Your suspicions were confirmed when you saw who it was.

( http://www.flickr.com/photos/40466689@N0... )

It was the Barbadian megastar Rihanna! You've had a crush on this caramel beauty forever. And now she appears to own you. Hopefully this will prove to be a good thing. She leaned down at you and had a smile on her face. But what sort of smile?
11213221.title: A Caged Pet

choices: Rihanna consummates her ownership of you.
Rihanna lets you snuggle between her boobs.
112132211.content:
Rihanna smiled gently at you and spoke. "Hello little guy. Did you sleep well." You were a bit shy to speak for multiple reasons; one, you were starstruck by Rihanna and two, she was now a giant compared to you and you feared saying one wrong word. You simply nod in return with a meager smile. She gives a concerned look. "Scared of me little one? You may only be three inches tall but you are also invincible thanks to my magic. Just like me. And also I won't be mean, you don't need to be shy." Three inches, boy you are tiny. But at least you were a manageable height. But how were you and her invincible. Her kind words were enough to help you gain the courage to speak, albeit very timidly. "Um... Miss Rihanna. How am I shrunk and, how are we both invincible?" you ask her surprised you could complete that question.

Rihanna explained clearly to you. "Well little one, you see I am magic. It sounds stupid, I know but for the sake of some privacy I keep it private. Some small little tricks in my home but you are the first person to know this." You were somewhat privileged to know such a thing, but still had many questions. "I'm honored to be the first, but why shrink me, and how did you shrink me in my sleep?" Rihanna looked at you confused. "In your sleep? No, I shrunk you last night when I saw you walking home alone. Then I knocked you out with a sleeping spell. You fell a bit hard so I shouldn't be too surprised you forgot. It was my first time performing it on a person and you're a cute fella so I would like to keep you from now on. I'll be nice, I'll be loving and you'll have nothing to fear. This cage was only to keep you before you woke up. You'll be sleeping with me in my bed." She finished that last sentence with a cheeky smile, aware that you blushed upon hearing that you would be sleeping with her.

Rihanna then opened the cage and picked you up into her soft palm. She smelt lovely, a sensual fragrance inhaled. She looked perfect as always, and being in her hand you had a front row view of the beauty that was her. You thought licking up to her would gain you further favor so you bowed in her palm, saying "thank you Miss Rihanna. I promise I'll be good." Said while smiling an unseen smile. Rihanna smiled at your cute gesture. "Aw, thank you cutie. But you can call me Ri-Ri. and you don't have to bow down to me. I'll be a kind owner to you, trust me." She seemed sincere at this and then kissed you with those perfect lips. Both the lipstick and your blush made you red. Rihanna cooed at how cute you looked. All of this you loved. The future was bright.
112132211.title: Beautiful Inside And Out

112132212.content:
You got quite nervous as Rihanna showed quite a malicious smirk at you. "About time your awake little one. I was getting impatient," she said rather displeased. You didn't even know how long you were asleep, so you felt it best just to apologize. "Sorry, Miss Rihanna." You bowed down in fear of her but she was understanding. "Fair enough little one, although it's Goddess Rihanna not Miss Rihanna." Upon hearing that you knew you will get dominated by her. "I won't ever hurt you, you and I are invincible thanks to my magic, and seeing as you're merely three inches tall you should be most grateful for that, am I clear?" she asked you authoritatively. "Yes, Goddess Rihanna." You would easily be saying that a lot from now on. She smiled, pleased you remembered. "Good boy. Here's how it will be. If you prove good for me, if you love, obey and respect me at all times, I will love and respect you, and we could even be friends or possibly more." You smiled, hopeful at the opportunity."

Then she continued. "If however you disrespect me, disobey me and show contempt for me I will treat you like a slave, for now you will be a servant which isn't too bad. It's really quite simple; obey and satisfy your Goddess and we will get along just fine. Do I make myself clear?" she asked you expecting her answer. "Yes, Goddess Rihanna." Overall you had little problems. Just do everything she says and you're great, but don't cock it up, which shouldn't happen because you will gladly serve your idol. You smiled at her making her curious. "Why so curious, little one?" she asked, interested. "Nothing Goddess Rihanna, just I'm honored for this privilege to be owned by you, let alone meet you." Rihanna smiled at this, seeing it as a potential for loyalty. "Well in that case I'll be a bit lenient. I have a feeling you will do me well." With that she took you out of the cage and held you in her hand.

Austin struggled to remove himself from the pancake and he found himself sinking further into the soft flat prison, He observed Taylor as she decimated a few bacon strips with her glistening teeth, Austin knew if he didn't find a way out soon he would end up just like the rest of her breakfast, Austin began to move a bit more attempting to break free from the surface of the pancake while at the same listening to Taylor's moans of satisfaction, He was almost lost In a trance staring at her vast expansive face her icy blue eyes and luscious red lips, Austin suddenly felt the surface shake as Taylor got up off her seat her tight glistening body still wrapped in a towel, she moved over to the counter and began to look for something, he took this as an opportunity to escape and began to slowly peel himself off the pancakes surface.

Austin was just about free from the pancakes surface when he noticed his sisters gigantic form once again returning to her seat only this time she had something in her hand it was a..A bottle of maple syrup! ''Oh that's not good'' Austin said as he broke his arm free from the pancake and began to stand up, observing as Taylor opened the cap on the syrup and began to pour it onto the pancake, Austin watched as a golden sea of liquid descended upon him he attempted to run but was swept along with the current until eventually he stopped and was glued to the pancakes surface unable to move a muscle, He watched In awe as Taylor's fork descended upon the piece of pancake he was lying on.

Taylor dug her fork into the pancake's surface and began to lift It towards her mouth slowly parting her lips as the fork entered her mouth along with the soft piece of pancake she then closed her lips and slowly pulled the fork away, she was pleased with the taste of the golden syrup.
she then began chewing the pancake until it was mashed up, she then let it rest on her tongue for a bit.

Meanwhile inside her mouth Austin was desperately screaming In hopes of getting her attention. he noticed her lips parting once more only this time It wasn't a fork that entered her mouth..It was massive tidal wave of orange juice which carried the chewed up pieces of pancake along with Austin down Taylor's throat and Into her stomach. there Austin was slowly broken down by her stomach acids until he became protein for Taylor's glorious body.
